**Government Tender Announcement**
================================

**Request for Standing Offer: Mental Health Training**
---------------------------------------------------

### Overview

Health Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a Standing Offer (SO) for the provision of Evidence-based and Validated mental health training in both official languages of Canada (English and French). The goal of this initiative is to increase resilience, develop non-expert intervention capacity, and reduce stigma surrounding mental health.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** CB-225-8561646
* **Solicitation Number:** 1000234682
* **Publication Date:** January 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 6, 2024, 12:00 PM (ET)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Statement of Work

The successful supplier will provide a comprehensive mental health training program, comprising two core courses, meeting all requirements outlined in sections 3 and 4 of the Statement of Work. This program will enable Health Canada to support the creation of a full spectrum of mental health awareness and basic response capacity amongst federal public servants.

### Contractual Terms

* **Contracting Entity:** Health Canada
* **Contact Information:** Shallee Doll, [shallee.doll@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:shallee.doll@hc-sc.gc.ca), 200 Eglantine Driveway, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9

### Tender Documents

* The complete Statement of Work and tender documentation can be accessed on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).
* Bidders must review all documents before submitting their proposal.
